Instruction: Trim the ends of the green beans.
In a skillet, melt the butter over medium heat.
Add minced garlic to the skillet and saut√© for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
Add the green beans to the skillet and toss to coat with garlic butter.
Season with salt and black pepper.
Cover and cook for 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the green beans are tender-crisp.
Remove from heat and serve hot as a tasty side dish.
